tool_description: Monitors real-time delivery status across all distribution channels, providing alerts for failures and detailed status reporting.

monitor_campaigns.description: Array of campaign IDs to monitor

error_messages: Invalid campaign IDs: One or more campaign IDs in monitor_campaigns are not found or not accessible.
Invalid alert thresholds: alert_thresholds values must be between 0 and 100 (percentages).
Invalid monitoring interval: monitoring_interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
Monitoring capacity exceeded: Maximum 15 campaigns can be monitored simultaneously.
usage: Provide monitor_campaigns array with campaign IDs to track. Optionally set alert_thresholds for automated failure alerts and monitoring_interval for status check frequency.

monitor_id.description: Unique identifier for the monitoring session

overall_status.description: Overall delivery status across all monitored campaigns

active_alerts.description: List of active alerts and warnings
